brain_training.title: Brain Training
brain_training.memory_performance: Your memory performance peaks between 10AM-2PM. Schedule challenging exercises during this window for optimal results.
brain_training.exercises.stroop_test.des: Select color of text, not the word itself!
brain_training.exercises.stroop_test.ins: You will see a color name
The text will be in a different color
Choose COLOR of text, ignore the word
brain_training.exercises.memory_cards.de: Find all matching pairs of cards!
brain_training.exercises.memory_cards.in: Tap a card to flip it
brain_training.exercises.n_back.name: N-Back Test
brain_training.exercises.n_back.prompt: Press "Yes" if current item matches item N steps back
brain_training.exercises.n_back.question: Matches {n} steps back?
brain_training.exercises.n_back.instruct: You will see a sequence of items
Press "Yes" if current item matches item N steps back
brain_training.exercises.quick_math.name: Quick Math
brain_training.exercises.quick_math.desc: Solve math problems as fast as you can!
brain_training.exercises.quick_math.inst: Solve the problem as fast as you can
Choose the correct answer from 4 options
brain_training.exercises.speed_reading.d: Train your reading speed and comprehension!
brain_training.exercises.spot_difference: Find all differences between two grids!
brain_training.exercises.anagrams.name: Anagrams
brain_training.exercises.anagrams.instru: Unscramble letters to form a word
Use hints if you get stuck
brain_training.exercises.sudoku.name: Sudoku
brain_training.exercises.sudoku.instruct: Fill each row, column, and 3x3 box with 1-9
No number can repeat in any row, column, or box
Use notes to mark possible numbers
Tap each number as quickly as possible
Keep focus on the center of the table
Use peripheral vision to scan the grid
Tip: Keep your focus on the center of the table and use peripheral vision
brain_training.exercises.memory_matrix.i: Select the correct emojis for hidden cells
brain_training.exercises.memory_matrix.t: Tap cell above to select emoji
The ancient library contained many books
The chef prepared a five-course meal
brain_training.exercises.upside_down_rea: The ancient library contained many books
The chef prepared a five-course meal
brain_training.exercises.invisible_bee.i: Indicate where the bee will be
Be careful - the bee is invisible!
brain_training.exercises.anticipation.in: Select the next item in the sequence
brain_training.exercises.reading_with_hi: Read text with top portion of each line hidden
Top 30% of each line is hidden
After reading, answer questions about the text
brain_training.exercises.masked_text.des: Read text with partially hidden lines
brain_training.exercises.masked_text.ins: Read the text carefully. The top part of each line is hidden.
You will have limited time to read based on difficulty level.
Answer questions about the text you just read.
brain_training.exercises.visual_math_puz: Solve equations with icons instead of numbers
Each icon represents a specific number
Solve final equation and select correct answer
brain_training.exercises.bourdon_letters: Find and count all occurrences of the target letter(s)
Scan the grid carefully - don't miss any!
Select the correct answer from the options
Submit your answer before time runs out
brain_training.exercises.bourdon_dice_do: Count groups with the specified number of dots
Dots are arranged like on dice
Select the correct answer from the options
Submit your answer before time runs out
brain_training.exercises.bourdon_constel: Count groups with the specified number of dots
Dots are in random positions - count carefully!
Select the correct answer from the options
Submit your answer before time runs out
brain_training.exercises.bourdon_numbers: Find and count all occurrences of the target number(s)
Scan the grid carefully - don't miss any!
Select the correct answer from the options
Submit your answer before time runs out
Read text with scrambled letters and answer comprehension questions
First and last letters are usually preserved
Answer comprehension questions about the text

legal.privacy_policy.title: Privacy Policy
legal.privacy_policy.sections.informatio: We collect information you provide directly, such as your name, email address, and learning preferences. We also collect usage data to improve our services.
legal.privacy_policy.sections.use_of_dat: Your data is used to provide personalized learning experiences, track your progress, and improve our AI algorithms. We do not sell your personal information to third parties.
legal.privacy_policy.sections.data_stora: Your data is stored securely on our servers using industry-standard encryption. You can request deletion of your data at any time.
legal.privacy_policy.sections.data_prote: We implement appropriate security measures to protect your personal information from unauthorized access, alteration, or disclosure.
legal.privacy_policy.sections.our_rights: We reserve the right to update this privacy policy at any time. Continued use of the app constitutes acceptance of any changes.
legal.terms_of_service.title: Terms of Service
legal.terms_of_service.sections.acceptan: By using this app, you agree to these terms of service. If you do not agree, please do not use the app.
legal.terms_of_service.sections.user_res: You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account and for all activities under your account.
legal.terms_of_service.sections.intellec: All content and materials in this app are owned by us and protected by intellectual property laws.
legal.terms_of_service.sections.limitati: We are not liable for any damages arising from the use or inability to use this app.
legal.terms_of_service.sections.terminat: We reserve the right to terminate or suspend your account at our sole discretion, without notice.
legal.terms_of_service.sections.subscrip: Subscriptions are billed through the app store and can be cancelled at any time.
onboarding.welcome.title:
Your brain is aging faster
than you think
onboarding.welcome.subtitle: After 25, cognitive performance drops 1-2% per year. But there's good news.
onboarding.welcome.description: Learn through your interests with AI-powered tutoring

onboarding.goals.subtitle: Your brain used to do this easily. Let's bring it back.
onboarding.wake_time.title: When do you wake up?
onboarding.wake_time.description: To send you timely morning training reminders when you're most likely to be free.
onboarding.concept.title: Brainura Morning Protocol
onboarding.concept.subtitle: Short exercises for memory, attention and thinking speed, based on neuroplasticity principles
onboarding.science.title: Your brain is a muscle
onboarding.science.subtitle: Like any muscle, it grows stronger with the right kind of stress and recovery.
onboarding.science.card_body: Regularly trained neural networks strengthen and perform their functions better.
onboarding.science.citation: Klingberg T. (2010). Training and plasticity of working memory. Brain, 134(6), 1591-1599.
onboarding.science.bottom_sheet.title: Brain Plasticity-Based Therapy
onboarding.science.bottom_sheet.key_resu: Neuroplasticity persists throughout life. Targeted training and exercises can modify brain structure and function. Combining behavioral interventions with understanding of plasticity mechanisms opens new possibilities for enhancing cognitive function.
onboarding.science.bottom_sheet.practica: Knowledge of neuroplasticity enables development of effective cognitive training programs. Regular brain exercises can improve memory, attention, and information processing speed across all ages.

onboarding.how_it_works.title: 10 minutes. Every morning.
onboarding.how_it_works.step1.title: Wake up
onboarding.how_it_works.step1.descriptio: Open Brainura right after your alarm.
onboarding.how_it_works.step2.title: Train
onboarding.how_it_works.step2.descriptio: 10 minutes of exercises matched to your level.
onboarding.how_it_works.step3.title: Get sharper
onboarding.how_it_works.step3.descriptio: Track your brain age dropping week by week.
onboarding.success_metric.title: Feel the difference in days
onboarding.success_metric.subtitle: Here's what users like you typically experience.
onboarding.success_metric.week_1_descrip: "I stopped hitting snooze. Mornings feel clearer."
onboarding.success_metric.week_2_descrip: "I remember things without writing them down. Brain fog is gone."
onboarding.success_metric.week_4_descrip: "I feel sharper than I did at 25. Colleagues noticed."

onboarding.brain_age_progress.descriptio: The good news? Your brain is plastic. With proper training, you can improve your cognitive age regardless of your chronological age.
onboarding.letter.title: Message from Your Future Self
onboarding.letter.subject: It worked.
onboarding.letter.benefit1: Brain fog is gone. Mornings are clear.
onboarding.letter.benefit2: I remember names and details without trying.
onboarding.letter.benefit3: I think faster than I have in years.

onboarding.letter.achievement_2: I remember names and details without trying.

onboarding.oath.title: 28 Days to Peak Productivity
onboarding.oath.subtitle: Make a commitment to yourself
onboarding.oath.commitment_text: "I commit to practicing Brainura daily to improve my cognitive focus and mental clarity. I commit to investing 10 minutes every morning in my cognitive performance and maintaining peak mental clarity."

Signature is only for motivation,
it is not saved anywhere

onboarding.completion.success_subtitle:
Your personalized brain training
is ready to begin.
onboarding.did_you_know.title:
Your brain peaks at 25.
Then it starts slowing down.
onboarding.did_you_know.description: Research shows cognitive decline begins in your mid-20s. Without training, your brain loses processing speed, memory capacity, and focus every year. The good news: targeted exercises can reverse years of decline in just weeks.
